answers.answer: Hello,Diabetes is the first possibility for frequent urination but it has been ruled out in your case. Other causes are glomerulonephritis, pyelonephritis(inflammation of the kidneys),urinary tract infection, hypercalcemia, hypokalemia(low potassium),hyperthyroidism, hyperparathyroidism and diuretic drugs.In my opinion, investigations like kidney functions, blood sugar levels, ultrasound lower abdomen ,intravenous pyelography , thyroid function tests and cystoscopy may be needed to confirm a diagnosis.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

Thanks singh, for your comments..I have gone for the Ultrasound scan and kidney size,prostate everything came out normal..I remember my thyroid levels are above the normal values..May be this could be the problem..I will talk to doctor about this...

question: Hi Everyone,I am 26 years old,5'10" height,61kg weight.I have been experiencing frequent urination problem from last three months.I feel like going to rest room all the time.If i drink 300 ml of water then i need to urinate atleast 5 times for every 30 min. Before going to bed i urinate as much as i can still i need to wake up two times.I consulted urologist and diagnosed for the below tests and results are like below:Ultrasound report:LIVER is normal in size and echotexture.The portal vein and CBD appear normal in course and calibre.GALL BLADDER is normal in size and echotexturePANCREAS is normal in size and echotexture.SPLEEN is normal in size(9.3cms) and echotexture.BOTH KIDNEYS are normal in size,position and echogenecity.Cortical thickness and corticomedullary differentiation are normal.No hydronephrosis and calcui noted.Right kidney measures 9.9X3.8 cms,Left kidney measures 10X4.1cms.There is no evidence of obvious retropertioneal addenopathy /ascitesBLADDER is normal in contour,capacity and wall thickness.PROSTATE measures 20 gms. It is normal in size and homogeneous ecchotexture.CREATININE 0.9 mg/dL.My sugar report also normal.FASTING BLOOD SUGAR: 94mg/dLPOST LUNCH BLOOD SUGAR:110 mg/dLUrologist asked me to come with Bladder diary for two days and then based on that he is going to take decision.I am little worried as what could be the problem?
title: Gotta pee all the time..very disturbing
